extendedInfo.description: Because of our natural rhythms, daybreak is the perfect time to open our bodies and center our minds. Let Rodney Yee be your daily guide through these five 20-minute morning practices. Each workout focuses on a specific area to loosen your muscles, relax your mind and energize you for the day ahead. Choose from Standing Poses, Twists, Backbends, Forward Bends and Hip Openers. Itâs simple enough for beginners, but effective for everyone.

reviews.title: My favorite  yoga DVD!
reviews.comment: I have used this yoga workout for over 2 years.  It is great.  I dont always do it in the AM but it is still effective anytime of day.  5 workouts between 20-25 min. each.  start with the forward bends it is easiest, then standing.  back bends and hip openers are more challenging but worth the effort.  so glad i can have this on my tablet now. Thank you Rodney Yee!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Rodney Yee is an excellent instructor, too quality video, clear and precise instruction.  Recommended!
reviews.author: Michelle Lamont
